body.name: utcoco Womens Cotton Linen Button Down Shirt Dress Casual Loose Cuffed Short Sleeve Dresses with Pockets
features: 【PREMIUM FABRIC】The women shirt dress is made of soft and skin-friendly fabric, that's lightweight and breathable, providing you a pleasant wearing experience.

【STYLISH DESIGN】This short shirt dresses for women feature cuffed short sleeve, chic and trendy. Button down closure make it easy to put on and take off. This button down shirt dress is perfect for the woman who wants to keep charming all the time. Your Best Choice!

【OCCASION】This button down shirt dress is perfect for party, club, street, shopping, beach, holiday, leisure or daily wear. Whether for a leidure time or a dressy look, the short shirt dress for women definitely makes you stunning!
【GARMENT CARE】This cotton linen shirt dress can be hand washed and machine washed. Do not bleach. Wash separately from different colors. Hang dry and iron low.
【WARM PROMPT】Please measure your waist circumference and refer to the seller's size chart before placing an order, not Amazon's size chart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and pockets!!
reviews.reviewText: Nice and roomy. Perhaps wear a slip with this dress because the cotton is a bit transparent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Label says polyester
reviews.reviewText: Both the title and the description say it’s a cotton and linen blend but the tag says 100% polyester. I live in humid, hot climate and cannot wear polyester without sweating buckets!!! Too bad because the fit was great. Returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the material advertised
reviews.reviewText: The cut and style and color are all great, but it's disappointing that the dress is not cotton as advertised. The tag does indeed indicate 100% polyester. I wanted to be done with plastic clothes, but I guess I'll keep the dress. Maybe some time I'll disassemble it and make a pattern so I can recreate the dress with natural fabric. I do agree the hip pockets are a bit small and would be better if they were deeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars TTS - size up to look like Amazon photos
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product in black in May 2023, and the dress I received was TTS and somewhat slim fitting. I'm keeping it because it does fit, and sometimes I like have a neat, fitted dress. BUT. There are quite a few reviews that say not to size up, and this is not accurate advice for the product I ordered. The bottom button is literally even with my crotch. I just now ordered an additional dress and sized up, because I really want the length for casual wear during the warmer months, and I can't really bend over in the size I ordered without ensuring that I'm very lady-like, knees bent, shoulders up, you know what I mean. I'm only giving it four stars because the buttons aren't quite right for a more tailored look when I move, reach, etc. There's just enough pull that the button gap will require a full slip, but because of how short it is, it's going to require one of those body suit slips which are not super comfortable in hot weather. For reference, I am 5’8 and most often wear a 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, sized right and comfortable dress
reviews.reviewText: This dress runs true to size. It is a little shorter, right at the knee, than I had hoped. It has to be taken out of the dryer immediately or it will wrinkle. Very comfortable. Good value for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This garment is NOT made of cotton/linen. It is 100% POLYESTER! I bought two of these dresses to take with me on vacation (in two days) to a hot climate…hence, the cotton fabric.. I don’t want to keep something I paid for under false pretenses, and the fact is, I was counting on these to round out my wardrobe. A dilemma caused by a dishonest company. ☹️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short sleeve black dress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too bad its not cotton/linen like it says it is
reviews.reviewText: I got this because it said it was a cotton/linen blend. What I got is marked 100% polyester. I wanted the cotton/linen blend so it would be cool in the summer. The polyester is not. I'll have to wear it in the fall and winter with pants. It should hold up well because polyester washes well and lasts forever, but I love linen. It looks nice but is considerably stiffer than the model images. It doesn't drape like cotton/linen would. The length also shrank a little after washing in cool water and hanging dry (no drier). Maybe that's just because it crinkled up a little more.There are things I really like about it--I love that it has upper and lower pockets and I really like the cut. Straight button-down shirt dresses are hard to come by these days. I like the style and the crinkle in the fabric. Its important to understand the difference between straight cuts and A-line cuts. In the product image, it looks like the dress might be A-line, but the dress I got is cut totally straight. The side seams are cut in a straight line down from the bust. There's no angle providing extra inches like you get with an A-line cut. This works best for women whose bust and hips are about the same size and who look good in pencil skirts rather than A-line skirts. Its not going to fit well on women who have significantly larger hips or heavy thighs. As long as you wear straight skirts well, it will look good.Its sewn well and generally true to size, and I would have given it a higher rating if they had been honest about the fabric content.
